name: Astronaut on a break
description:
You play as an astronaut who needs to extract resources for the manufacture of spare parts for the ship.

How to play:

Print 2 parts to win. If the generator is destroyed you lose.

Right mouse button - fire
Left mouse button - aim
WASD - movement
TAB - inventory/to do list
X - close menu
E - start interaction
Q - stop interaction
Shift - sprint
1 - primary weapon
2 - secondary weapon
R - reload
F - holster weapon
V - switch fire mode

The project was developed in my free time.

It is planned to add more printable weapons and printable vehicles, improved environment, multiplayer.
